This is the resulting directory after tiling and formatting the images for YOLO to process them and train the model.
under each folder with the name of the scene we have around 13,000 tiles per scene.
The train.txt and val.txt are used to store the symlinks to the training and validation sets, this makes the script run faster 
and avoid moving all the tiles from one folder to another.

yolo_tiled_speckle_new
├── data.yaml
├── images
│   ├── S1A_IW_GRDH_1SDV_20200126T052956_20200126T053025_030967_038E50_B43E
│   ├── S1A_IW_GRDH_1SDV_20200126T175311_20200126T175336_030975_038E94_BAE3
